description:
***Back up your Lists to Google Spreadsheets!!***
***Added new Time format, use to record duration for things like your joggins stats***

This is the  essential information management tool for your Palm WebOS device to manage all your day to day information. 

Perfect for managing,  Birthdays, Anniversaries, Bills, Credit Card numbers, To Do Items, Library Books, CDs, DVDs, Games, Cheat Codes.  
Keep track of your Weight, Mileage, Calories, Grades, Weight Training, Blood Pressure, or just about anything you need to remember or store. 

MyLists lets you create your own lists and add up to 20 items (Pro version is unlimited). Sort the lists, create and edit fields.

MyLists comes installed with several sample lists that will get you started right away. Once you are familiar with MyLists you will be creating your own lists in no time. There is no limit to the number of lists you can create. 

MyLists is very powerful, but is designed to be simple and easy to use.

MyLists is your one stop tool for all your list and personal data management needs.
Check out our help page for data migration tools.

You can upgrade from MyLists Lite to Pro at anytime. MyLists Pro is on sale at 50% off.
versionNote: Time 24 data type, allows you to record duration of time or use 24 hour format instead of am/pm.
